display_long_description:
MotoX is a fast paced, adrenaline packed VR motocross experience that throws you right into the action. With more than 20 unique tracks and a massive selection of bikes, including several fan favorites, every ride feels fresh, intense, and full of possibilities.

[media]

🏁 Multiplayer and Voice Chat
Race players from around the world in real time multiplayer and communicate with teammates or rivals using built in voice chat. Every close call and every crash hits hard when you are in the rider’s seat.

🔥 Game Modes
Test your skills in Time Trials, challenge others in classic racing, or dive into chaotic party modes like Infected. Master a full range of freestyle tricks including flips, whips, wheelies, stoppies, supermans, and plenty more.

🎨 Customization
Make your rider and bikes your own. Personalize your gear, colors, and style so you stand out on the track no matter where you race.

🌍 Tracks and Environments
Ride through over 20 dynamic tracks featuring jumps, hazards, and environments designed to push your control and creativity. With new tracks added regularly, there is always something new to conquer.

🔄 Monthly Updates
MotoX grows constantly with new features, content, customization options, bikes, power ups, and gameplay improvements to keep the experience exciting.

Strap on your headset, fire up your engine, and throw yourself into high speed racing, big air tricks, and nonstop VR motocross action.

[media]
